default: Something went wrong on our side, please contact our support.
forbidden: You are not allowed to access this resource.
notFound: The requested resource could not been found.
unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource
invalidToken: The given token is not valid.
invalidCredentials: The email and password combination you entered is incorrect.
userNotFound: We couldn't find your Vulpee account.
passwordsNotIdentical: Both passwords need to match to change your password.
resetPasswordInvalidToken: The reset token is not valid. Please try requesting a new token via the forgot password form.
